body.name: Kitchen Knife, 3-Pcs Knife Set With Sheath, 8 Inch Chef Knife, 4.5 Inch Utility Knife, 4 Inch Paring Chef Knife, Stainless Steel, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 1. Cokuma Advantage: Combined with the Modern Garden-Style Workshops and innovation design, Cokuma is expanding worldwide with the mission to provide affordable cutlery products to fifty million people of middle class in US.

2. Kitchen Knife Set Includes: 8 Inch Chef Knife, 4.5 Inch Utility, 4 Inch Paring Knife and three matching knife sheath. It can be used for your daily kitchen tasks of chopping, slicing, dicing and mincing of all kinds of meat, vegetables, fruits and bread. It is suitable for both home and restaurant kitchens.

3. German High Quality Steel: Precision-forged from imported premium quality, high-carbon German steel-3CR13MOV. which is sturdy and sharp to get the job done perfectly. Rockwell hardness: 56 ± 2 HRC. Hand-polished by craftsmen with decades of experience to ensure its durability.

4. Ergonomic ABS Handle: The blade of this chef knife set is integrated with a soft and comfortable handle, creating the perfect grip. The ergonomic shape enables the right balance between the handle and the thin blade, ensuring ease of movement.

5. What you got: 8 Inch chef’s Knife, 4.5 Inch utility Knife, 4 Inch paring knife and three matching Knife cover. Both Knives and Sheaths are 100% BPA free and lead free. Hand wash is recommended for best performance.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COKUMA was established in 1983, from the manual production of carbon steel kitchen knives to modernized, mechanized, large-scale production of thousands of specifications of the knife brand, its products include knife sets, single knife, chef's knife, etc. Decades of experience and technology in knife making and continuous development of new materials,make the perfect blend of design and technology.

3 Pieces Kitchen Knife Set with Sheaths Chef knife, utility knife, paring knife kitchen knives set,three knives to meet most of your daily needs.Knife cover as accessories more convenient storage, better protection of knives and your family. Full-tang Blade with Ergonomic Handle Very classic handle design, with practicality and ergonomic.Full-tang blade with three rivets fixing,greatly improves the usability and safety of the knife. Premium stainless steel and razor blade The best feature of our product is the blade. Hand polishing by the craftsmen who have worked for many years.Stainless steel with high carbon content makes knives strong,the high chromium content keeps steel from rusting.

What you got 3-Pcs kitchen knives with sheath 1. 8 inch chef knife 2. 4.5 inch utility knife 3. 4 inch paring knife 4. Three matching knife sheathes Warm Tips Dishwasher not recommended. Rinse and dry with water after use. Keep the knives away from children. The knife needs to be sharpened at regular intervals to keep it sharp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and well built
reviews.reviewText: Bought these to leave in our RV permanently. They are good looking sharp and durable. Very affordable and great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a knife set
reviews.reviewText: Three sharp yet very light weight knives. I use them daily and have no complaints. Good value for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: Rust easy. Lightweight. They serve their purpose. It would nice to have instructions for proper care.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality Knives Set
reviews.reviewText: Great quality and amazingly low price point. Love the protective sleeve. Very sharp and lightweight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very light weight and sharp
reviews.reviewText: Really surprise the sturdy and sharpness of the knifes - We are very pleased. Perfect sizes and very light. The price... great! - 100% recommended

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sharp and lightweight. Affordable. Will make your food prep easier

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Fine for minimal use
reviews.reviewText: These are really flimsy/cheap, but that is really what you should expect for the price. I kept them as they only need to serve the purpose of being used a few times a year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: these knives ae very inexpensive but stand up to the higher priced knives, don't be fooled by the cost, worth the investment
